bug.author: elben10
bug.summary: wikidata_pretrain_kb.py fails to process wiki articles due to change {lang}wiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2
bug.description: The format of {lang}wiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 has changed. The text tag previous looked like this <text xml:space="preserve"> but now look like this <text bytes="{NUMBER}" xml:space="preserve"> Thus, the function bin.entity_linking.wikipedia_processor._process_wp_text fails to parse any wikipedia article.

comments.comment: Thanks again for the report and for contributing the PR!
You're welcome. Thanks for the good guidance. Have a nice day!
